SELECT g_seq, g_title, g_content, g_regdate, g_readcnt, g_tag, g_writer, (SELECT f_thumbname FROM files f WHERE f.g_seq = g.g_seq GROUP BY g_seq) AS g_thumbname, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(f_originname SEPARATOR ',') FROM files f WHERE f.g_seq = g.g_seq GROUP BY g_seq) AS f_originname FROM gallery g WHERE 1 = 1
AND ${searchCondition} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(f_originname SEPARATOR ',') FROM files f WHERE f.g_seq = g.g_seq GROUP BY g_seq) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY g_seq DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM gallery g WHERE 1 = 1
AND ${searchCondition} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(f_originname SEPARATOR ',') FROM files f WHERE f.g_seq = g.g_seq GROUP BY g_seq) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
SELECT t_name, COUNT(t_name) AS t_usecnt, SUM(t_readcnt) AS t_readcnt FROM tag GROUP BY t_name ORDER BY t_usecnt DESC, t_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(f.f_downcnt) AS t_downcnt FROM gallery g JOIN files f WHERE g.g_seq = f.g_seq AND g_tag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{t_name}, '%')
